projects.title: Home Lab Kubernetes Cluster
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade Kubernetes infrastructure with 9 HP Spectre SFF PC nodes, Calico CNI, and GitLab CI/CD.
projects.fullDescription:
• Architected an enterprise-grade Kubernetes infrastructure comprising 9 HP Spectre SFF PC nodes running Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, implementing network segmentation using Calico CNI.
• Engineered robust high-availability configurations with a distributed control plane, load balancing, and resource scheduling algorithms to optimize workload distribution and ensure system reliability.
• Implemented infrastructure-as-code principles using Hashicorp Packer and a GitLab CI/CD pipeline for zero-downtime deployments.
• Designed and implemented networking solutions, including a service mesh with Istio, for advanced traffic management and security.
• Established monitoring and observability infrastructure utilizing Prometheus and Grafana, creating dashboards and alerting systems.
• Leveraged Lens as a centralized management interface, integrating custom resource definitions and operators.

projects.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
projects.shortDescription: Architected and benchmarked ML models for fraud detection, improving precision and reducing false positives.
projects.fullDescription:
• Architected and benchmarked efficacy of four machine learning models to detect anomalies evaluating their performance across six metrics.
• Engineered an innovative feature selection methodology that achieved breakthrough performance with a 23% precision improvement and approximately 30% reduction in false positives compared to industry-standard systems, enabling mission-critical real-time transaction analysis for financial institutions.
• Pioneered novel approaches to imbalanced dataset handling, implementing advanced sampling techniques and custom loss functions that dramatically improved model robustness when detecting rare fraudulent transactions within massive legitimate transaction volumes.
• Published as first author in prestigious international journal: Study of Machine Learning Algorithms for Credit Card Fraud Detection (IRJMETS Vol 4. 2022), contributing significant advancements to the field of financial security and algorithmic fraud detection.

projects.title: Advanced Stock Price Prediction System
projects.shortDescription: Developed a stock price prediction system using time series regression, deep learning (LSTM), and Streamlit.
projects.fullDescription:
• Developed a stock price prediction system using time series regression and deep learning.
• Engineered a real-time application with Streamlit for visualizations and forecasts.
• Implemented FBProphet for time series forecasting.
• Designed and implemented an LSTM network for enhanced prediction accuracy.

projects.title: Smart Solid Waste Management and Composting System
projects.shortDescription: Engineered an Arduino-based IoT prototype for automated organic waste composting.
projects.fullDescription:
• Engineered an Arduino-based waste management prototype with ESP32 microcontrollers.
• Developed environmental control algorithms using sensor feeds.
• Designed custom circuit architecture and power management systems.
• Implemented data collection and analysis capabilities for system refinement.
